a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Lung cancer death rate in men vs. women
The reported annual death rate from lung cancer per 100,000 people in men versus women, based on the

underlying cause
listed on death certificates.

Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, the metrics are
age-standardized
. All deaths in a country may not have

been registered with a
cause of death
.
